item.title: Lesson 1

item.title: Introduction to NumPy
item.description:
This lesson introduces you to one of the building block Python as a scientific computing tool.

The notebook for this lesson is available here

item.title: Attribute based Diversification of Seeds for Targeted Influence Maximization
Cores matter? An analysis of graph decomposition effects on influence maximization
A Framework for Complex Inﬂuence Propagation based on the F 2DLT Class of Diﬀusion Models
Cores matter? An analysis of graph decomposition effects on influence maximization problems
Complex influence propagation based on trust-aware dynamic linear threshold models
Topology-Driven Diversity for Targeted Influence Maximization with Application to User Engagement in Social Networks
Trust-based dynamic linear threshold models for non-competitive and competitive influence propagation
Trust-Based Dynamic Linear Threshold Models for Non-competitive and Competitive Influence Propagation
Machine Learning Crash Course with TensorFlow APIs
